name: Lightning (Claire Farron) - Final Fantasy XIII - Character LoRA
description:
Use weight of around 0.67 for best results.

LoRA trained on SD 1.5.

Images trained on game official art and ingame screenshots. Note the "cat ears" in the negative prompt. I only had one training image where Claire had cat ears, yet it spontaneously shows up more often than not in the generated images. Might be a positive for some people. It is necessary to add "pink hair" to the prompt to get the Lightning look.

Images uploaded were generated using GalaxyTimeMachine Photo model. However, also works well with DreamShaper and chilloutmix.
